question: Which state increase the retirement age of regular state government employees to 60 years?
explanation: Arunachal Pradesh government has decided to increase the retirement age of regular state government employees to 60 years. It will be implemented from 1st of January 2018. It observed that there are various categories of employees who are already having the benefit of retirement age of 60 years. observed that there are various categories of employees who are already having the benefit of retirement age of 60 years.
